story: Emad Mokhtar Habib shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: No More Horizontal Scroll Bar in Visual Studio 2012 | Emad Mokhtar's Framework
caption: emadmokhtar.com
description: No More Horizontal Scroll Bar in Visual Studio 2012 Every time I’m working on ASP.NET WebForms and open .ASPX file I found an ugly Horizontal scroll bar, and the worst case when you’re searching for attribute for big control like GridView and you want to change it,it’s like a hell, I hate doing this...
